node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 患者獨居於南區赤柱大街 18 號。自 3 月 7 日開始出現咳嗽和喉嚨痛徵狀，於潛伏期內曾外遊。他於 2 月 27 日至 3 月 9 日在美國佛羅里達州，後於 3 月 10 日由佛羅里達州經日本東京乘搭全日空 NH811 返抵香港。
node.detail_en: The patient lives alone in 18 Stanley Main Street.   He started showing coughing and sore throat on Mar 7.    He was in Colorado US during Feb 27 and Mar 9, then he transferred in Tokyo by ANA flight NH811 from Colorado back to Hong Kong on Mar 10.

node.remarks_zh: 患者獨居，過往健康良好
node.remarks_en: Patient lives with good past health.

node.remarks_zh: 由科羅拉多州經日本抵港
node.remarks_en: Returned to Hong Kong from Colorado via Tokyo
Patient had travel history during the incubation period.

node.location_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.remarks_zh: 3 月7 日開始出現咳嗽和喉嚨痛，3 月 12 日經其家庭醫生提交痰液樣本作檢測。其痰液樣本證實對病毒呈陽性反應，已入院接受治療
node.remarks_en: Developed cough and sore throat since Mar 7. His sputum specimen was sent for testing through his family physician on Mar 12. The specimen was tested positive for coronavirus and was admitted for management at PYNEH.
